DK Aviation is a STEAM Education Aeromodelling Flight School. A first of its kind for sure, but as was a plane for the Wright brothers. The pioneers of aviation believed that “It is possible to fly without motors, but not without knowledge and skill.” And this is my humble try to create future aviators and a cry to fellow dreamers, who have always looked up to the sky when a plane is passing by.
